Information Brewery Tour

Rooster roots

Rooster was literally started in a backyard with one guy, one tiny system and a huge level of determination. This meant that creativity and ingenuity to get the job done was paramount. When we couldn’t afford something we made it, fabricating our own tanks, keg cleaning equipment, cooling systems, and brew house. To put it mildly, it wasn’t easy. Rooster’s success wasn’t bought, it was earned though blood sweat and tears. While we are proud of our roots, we certainly are glad they are behind us. The next step in our growth radically changed our quality and our ability to compete as a top shelf craft beer.

Our brewery

Rooster was literally started in a backyard with one guy, one tiny system and a huge level of determination. This meant that creativity and ingenuity to get the job done was paramount. When we couldn’t afford something we made it, fabricating our own tanks, keg cleaning equipment, cooling systems, and brew house. To put it mildly, it wasn’t easy. Rooster’s success wasn’t bought, it was earned though blood sweat and tears. While we are proud of our roots, we certainly are glad they are behind us. The next step in our growth radically changed our quality and our ability to compete as a top shelf craft beer.
